component.name: ModelComponentGrid
component.definition: Definition of component type ModelComponentGrid required

parameter.name: Mnemonic
parameter.definition: The grid mnemonic (e.g. : N96L38, T42L26, ORCA1L42). May be different (shorter) than the grid short name.

parameter.name: GridDiscretization
parameter.definition: Type of horizontal grid discretization.

value.name: logically rectangular
value.definition: The coordinate space (x,y) is translated into one-to-one index space (i,j). (source for def.:gridSpec)

value.name: composite
value.definition: The grid is a composite or 2 or more single grid types.

parameter.name: SpectralTruncatureNumber
parameter.definition: Triangular truncature number of the horizontal discretization scheme.

parameter.name: CompositeGridDiscretization
parameter.definition: Types of discretization used in the composite grid.

value.name: logically rectangular
value.definition: The coordinate space (x,y) is translated into one-to-one index space (i,j). (source for def.:gridSpec)

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Type of composite horizontal grid.

value.name: icosahedral
value.definition: Grid that results from a structured triangular discretization of an icosahedral projection; can be described as composite of "logically rectangular" diamonds.

parameter.name: CompositeGrid
parameter.definition: Further details about the composite horizontal grid.

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Type of horizontal grid.

value.name: latitude-longitude
value.definition: Grid points geographical coordinates can be uniquely defined by one-dimentionnal, monotically increasing of decreasing arrays (i.e. lon(i), lat(j)); grid point spacing may be irregular along each direction.

value.name: regular gaussian
value.definition: Gaussian grid (as opposed to "reduced gaussian") corresponding to a given spectral decomposition; note that "spectral gaussian" grids are particular "regular latitude-longitude".

value.name: displaced pole
value.definition: Grid resulting from logically-rectangular discretization for which the North pole has been displaced; this type of grid is also known as "assymetrical bipolar"; "rotated pole" grid can be described as a particular "displaced pole".

value.name: tripolar
value.definition: Grid resulting from a logically rectangular discretization; in order to deal with pole singularities, tripolar grids have usually 2 poles in northern hemisphere, placed over land in the case of an oceanic model; a well-known example is the tripolar grid of Murray (1996).

value.name: cubed sphere
value.definition: Grid resulting from a logically rectangular discretization; a well-known example is the cube sphere grid of Rancic et al. (1996).

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Type of horizontal grid.

value.name: icosahedral
value.definition: Grid resulting from a structured triangular discretization of an icosahedral projection; can be described as composite of "logically rectangular" diamonds.

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Type of horizontal grid.

parameter.name: NumberOfLongitudinalGridCells
parameter.definition: Number of grid cells along a parallel.

parameter.name: NumberOfLatitudinalGridCells
parameter.definition: Number of grid cells along a half-meridian (-90°N,+90°N).

parameter.name: NumberOfLongitudinalGridPoints
parameter.definition: Number of grid points along a parallel.

parameter.name: NumberOfLatitudePointsPoleToEquator
parameter.definition: Number of latitude points between the pole and the equator.

parameter.name: NumberOfTotalGridPoints
parameter.definition: Number of total grid points.

parameter.name: NumberOfLatitudePointsPoleToEquator
parameter.definition: Number of latitude points between the pole and the equator.

parameter.name: FirstPoleLat
parameter.definition: Latitude of the first pole.

parameter.name: FirstPoleLon
parameter.definition: Longitude of the first pole.

parameter.name: SecondPoleLat
parameter.definition: Latitude of the second pole.

parameter.name: SecondPoleLon
parameter.definition: Longitude of the second pole.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInFirstGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the first grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInSecondGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the second grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInFirstGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the first grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInSecondGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the second grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfGridsCellsInFirstDimensionOfDiamond
parameter.definition: Number of grid cells in the first dimension of each of the 20 diamonds.

parameter.name: NumberOfGridsCellsInSecondDimensionOfDiamond
parameter.definition: Number of grid cells in the second dimension of each of the 20 diamonds.

parameter.name: FirstPoleLat
parameter.definition: Latitude of the first pole.

parameter.name: FirstPoleLon
parameter.definition: Longitude of the first pole.

parameter.name: SecondPoleLat
parameter.definition: Latitude of the second pole.

parameter.name: SecondPoleLon
parameter.definition: Longitude of the second pole.

parameter.name: ThirdPoleLat
parameter.definition: Latitude of the third pole.

parameter.name: ThirdPoleLon
parameter.definition: Longitude of the third pole.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInFirstGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the first grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInSecondGridDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the second grid dimension.

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInFirstTileDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the first dimension of the tile (the "tile" is either ying or yang).

parameter.name: NumberOfCellsInSecondTileDimension
parameter.definition: Number of cells in the second dimension of the tile (the "tile" is either ying or yang).

parameter.name: GridResolution
parameter.definition: Any relevant details about the possibly varying resolution.

parameter.name: GridRefinementScheme
parameter.definition: Any relevant details about grid refinement in specific geographical regions.

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinateType
parameter.definition: Vertical coordinate system.

value.name: terrain-following
value.definition: Vertical coordinate requiring an elevation map as reference.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinate
parameter.definition: The terrain-folowing vertical coordinate used.

parameter.name: SurfaceReference
parameter.definition: The surface used as reference for a terrain-following vertical coordinate.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinate
parameter.definition: The space-based vertical coordinate used.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinate
parameter.definition: The mass-based vertical coordinate used.

value.name: isentropic
value.definition: Coordinate following the surface of potential temperature.

parameter.name: SurfaceReference
parameter.definition: Surface used as reference for a mass-based vertical coordinate.

parameter.name: PartialSteps
parameter.definition: Whether the model uses partial steps or not; partial steps allow the topography heights not to be expressed on model levels.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinate
parameter.definition: Hybrid vertical coordinate used.

parameter.name: Hybridization
parameter.definition: Give details about the construction of the hybrid vertical coordinate (e.g. first coordinate below a given level, second coordinate above); may include the formula terms according to CF.

parameter.name: Domain
parameter.definition: Total number of atmospheric vertical levels.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of atmospheric vertical levels.

parameter.name: TopModelLevel
parameter.definition: Level at top of the atmosphere.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsBelow850hPa
parameter.definition: Number of atmospheric vertical levels bellow 850 hPa.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsAbove200hPa
parameter.definition: Number of atmospheric vertical levels above 200 hPa.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of oceanic vertical levels.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsInUpper100m
parameter.definition: Number of oceanic vertical levels in the upper 100 meters.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper oceanic level.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower oceanic level.
